About

We want to help millions of people take free college courses

College level courses should be free.

Education is a human right. We believe in a free, world class education for anyone, anywhere in the world.

Start Learning

We’re a community of learners.

We are a community of students, engineers, scientists and more, all passionate about lifelong learning. Join us now, it’s free.

Our Values

World Class Quality

We value creating high quality, 100% free college courses.

Diverse Offerings

We want to offer a number of different offerings to members from free educational videos to bounties.

Community

No one should have to learn alone. That’s why we strive to build a strong, supportive community of learners.
